mapper.select: SELECT t1.*, t2.is_passed, t2.student_number FROM interview_record t1 JOIN user_info t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.id AND (t1.deleted != 1 AND t2.deleted != 1)

SELECT t1.*, t2.is_passed, t2.student_number FROM interview_record t1 JOIN user_info t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.id WHERE ${keyword} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') AND (t1.deleted != 1 AND t2.deleted != 1);
SELECT t1.*, t2.is_passed, t2.student_number FROM interview_record t1 JOIN user_info t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.id WHERE t2.is_passed = #{isPassed} AND (t1.deleted != 1 AND t2.deleted != 1)
SELECT t1.*, t2.is_passed, t2.student_number FROM interview_record t1 JOIN user_info t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.id WHERE t2.is_passed = false AND (t1.deleted != 1 AND t2.deleted != 1)
SELECT Count(t2.is_passed) FROM interview_record t1 JOIN user_info t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.id AND (t1.deleted != 1 AND t2.deleted != 1)
SELECT Count(t2.is_passed) FROM interview_record t1 JOIN user_info t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.id AND (t1.deleted != 1 AND t2.deleted != 1) WHERE t2.is_passed = true
SELECT Count(t2.is_passed) FROM interview_record t1 JOIN user_info t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.id AND (t1.deleted != 1 AND t2.deleted != 1) WHERE t2.is_passed = false
mapper.update: UPDATE user_info t2 SET t2.is_passed = CASE WHEN t2.is_passed = '1' THEN '0' ELSE '1' END WHERE t2.student_number = #{studentId} AND t2.deleted != 1;
UPDATE user_info t2 SET t2.is_passed = CASE WHEN t2.is_passed = '1' THEN '0' ELSE '1' END WHERE t2.id = #{userId} AND t2.deleted != 1;
